span.p: At the direction of Governor Andrew Cuomo, all schools will remain closed through Friday, May 15. Please continue to monitor the district website for updates.

p.em: Important Information Regarding COVID-19 Impacts on Election Process

By Section 29-a of Article 2-B of the Executive Law to issue any directive during a disaster emergency necessary to cope with the disaster, the following directives for the period from the date of this Executive Order through April 28, 2020 are as follows:

li.em: Circulation, filing, and collection of any designating petitions, or independent nominating petitions for any office that would otherwise be circulated or filed pursuant to the Election Law, Education Law or any other consolidated law for any office commencing March 31, 2020 are hereby postponed.

Any school board, library board, or village election scheduled to take place in April or May of 2020 is hereby postponed until at least June 1, 2020, and subject to further directive as to the timing, location or manner of voting for such elections.

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,
